attributes.action: bring back concessions in colleges for adults
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i left school with hardly any qualfications and started to raise a family, i spent the next 17yrs fostering children with learning and behaviour difficulties, i wanted to do something else so i signed up for a bookeeping course at my local college, i passed my exam and decided to carry on with the next part of the course, i passed, when i went to sign up  i was told that there are no concessions for me any more and i have to pay the full fees, i am married to somebody who only gets a state pension, as i am only in my forties i do not want to rely on the state to look after me, but now i have to wait until i can get the £200 for the next part and then it is going to cost me £600 to finish, i am very disappointed as i want to get back into the work force.
could you please look into bringing back the concessions as i do not want the last two years to be a waste of time.
